message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I believe it's a perfect match for you and could greatly enhance your experience. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose a price of $140 for it. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring we cover our costs and make a fair profit. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget and preferences. Looking forward to your positive response.
